title: Johnny Steele
text:
John Steele (24 November 1916 – 14 January 2008) was a Scottish <a href="association%20football">football</a> player and <a href="manager%20%28association%20football%29">manager</a>.
Steele signed for <a href="Barnsley%20F.C.">Barnsley</a> from <a href="Ayr%20United%20F.C.">Ayr United</a> for £2,500 in June 1938. He died of a stroke on 14 January 2008, at the age of 91.
